Package Game.Player

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DummyBot, RealPlayer
    public interface Player
    Contains stub methods used by all players of type Player: RealPlayer, DummyBot.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean checkMove​(Board board, Coordinates coordinates)
      Checks if the move is valid or not.
      boolean checkPlayerColor​(Player player)
      Method that determines the color used by the player.
      Coordinates chooseMove​(java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates> validCoordinates)
      Chooses the move for the DummyBot.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the name of the player.

    • Method Detail

      • checkPlayerColor

        boolean checkPlayerColor​(Player player)
        Method that determines the color used by the player.
        Parameters:
        player - currently checked player
        Returns:
        boolean if the color is white

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the player.
        Returns:
        String name

      • checkMove

        boolean checkMove​(Board board,
                  Coordinates coordinates)
        Checks if the move is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        board - 6x6 board containing 4 3x3 squares
        coordinates - x,y pair
        Returns:
        boolean true if move can be placed, or false if the move cannot be placed
        Requires
        board != null, coordinates != null
        Ensures
        boolean == true || boolean == false

      • chooseMove

        Coordinates chooseMove​(java.util.ArrayList<Coordinates> validCoordinates)
        Chooses the move for the DummyBot.
        Parameters:
        validCoordinates - is a list of all valid possible moves as coordinates
        Returns:
        coordinates currently chosen coordinates
        Requires
        validCoordinates != null, validCoordinates.isEmpty() != false
        Ensures
        Coordinates != null
